data.actual_result: It takes me to the library tab on a new browser tab instead of opening the link
data.expected_result: The web client should open the link and take you to the website
data.short_description: The "Yep" button on the spoopy link modal does not work on Discord web and throws you into the activity tab [PTB/Stable web only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Use Discord Web (PTB or Stable) - Find a spoopy link, like from a Trello embed title or a GitHub webhook - Click "Yep" on the modal - Observe how you for some reason gets put into a channel as /{server_id}/{channel_id}/null then into the activity tab
